text: Kaya tumhi nahi pahata ki allahacya samoraca sajada karatata je akasata aheta ani jaminivara aheta. Tyacapramane surya, candra, tare, parvata, vrksa, pasu ani sajiva1 ani aneka manava dekhila. Hoya bahuteka asehi aheta, jyanna (allahaci) siksa- yatana lagu jhali ahe ani jyala allaha apamanita karela, tyala mana-pratistha denara koni nahi, allaha je icchito te karato
